name: MidnightDream
description:
Hello guys!

This is my first game and I tried really hard to make it. It was made for Mini Jam 130. The theme was Lunar and the limitation was "10 seconds". The time period was 72 hours and I publish this game just 2 hours before the deadline and in 5 am lol. I have learned a lot from this experience and I am happy with the results.
